According to an arrest report , the incident took place on Sunday , just before 3 p.m. Police say they were initially called to the Thorntons on Bardstown Road , near Goldsmith Lane , after someone there reported that there was a man , who was possibly drunk , harassing customers at the store .
The caller told police that they were familiar with the man and that it was an ongoing problem at the store .
Police say they found a man matching that description -- 20 - year - old Shanon Mattingly -- on the sidewalk in front of Thorntons .

That hotel is secured by a chain link fence , according to the arrest report .

While in custody , Mattingly allegedly complained that he was about to pass out .

When an officer briefly let him outside the police vehicle to get some air and determine whether EMS was required , he allegedly pulled away and tried to run from the officer , but the officer was able to wrestle him back into custody .
